Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Method:
Indirect- Hard-copy evaluation form is filled -mandatory- by all students upon submission of training report. The course coordinator analyzes survey data and submit to the program coordinator and course instructors for evaluation and
developing planning.

Direct- An instructor from Department of Biological Sciences is assigned to a section with a number of near- graduating students- for supervision on the training experience,, evaluation and
grading on OdusPlus for Bio 390.

Direct- An official form from Faculty of Science for Field Training is provided at the start of training period for the student at the training site for the supervisor to be filled by the end of training period. This form includes evaluation of student knowledge, practical work, commitment and overall
performance during training.

Indirect- An item in Graduate students survey (KAU Central Survey System) is regarding the Field Experience. The graduate student, especially if already offered a job, can evaluate the training experience and its
impact on their work experience.
